attributes.action: Richard Branson should run for prime minister
attributes.additional_details:
Who agrees that someone who has made millions/billions+ from nothing should run for prime minister?
We as a country are in deep troubles; it will take a true entrepreneur to "fix this country" and who better than Richard Branson?
May I suggest he runs with UKIP, but I really do not care who he runs with if he was in charge I simply am suggesting he would get the country sorted once and for all! AND WE WOULD BE BACK TO GREAT BRITAIN
After all these depressing figures released today again I stress this guy could make a serious positive input to the country.


"If" he was in charge of transport" to start with he would turn it around.
